metadata.title: CVE-2024-7883 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description: When using Arm Cortex-M Security Extensions (CMSE), Secure stackcontents can be leaked to Non-secure state via floating-point registerswhen a Secure to Non-secure function call is made that returns afloating-point value and when this is the first use of floating-pointsince entering Secure state. This allows an attacker to read a limitedquantity of Secure stack contents with an impact on confidentiality.This issue is specific to code generated using LLVM-based compilers.

criterions.comment: llvm-toolchain-14 package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
llvm-toolchain-15 package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
llvm-toolchain-16 package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
llvm-toolchain-17 package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
llvm-toolchain-18 package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
